丈.definition: measure of length, ten Chinese feet (3.3 m); to measure; husband; polite appellation for an older male

丈二和尚，摸不著頭腦.pinyin: zhang4 er4 he2 shang5 , mo1 bu5 zhao2 tou2 nao3
丈二和尚，摸不著頭腦.definition: lit. like a three-meter high monk, you can't rub his head (idiom); fig. at a total loss

丈二金剛摸不著頭腦.pinyin: zhang4 er4 Jin1 gang1 mo1 bu5 zhao2 tou2 nao3
丈二金剛摸不著頭腦.definition: see 丈二和尚，摸不著頭腦|丈二和尚，摸不着头脑[zhang4 er4 he2 shang5 , mo1 bu5 zhao2 tou2 nao3]

丈八蛇矛.definition: ancient spear-like weapon 18 Chinese feet 尺[chi3] in length, with a wavy spearhead like a snake's body
